Author: 53m1k0l0n/Gidedin (Puni.sh)
Name: LazyLoot
Description:
Roll command with various arguments need | needonly | greed | pass | passall. 
Chat and Toast output and delay for rolling.
ChangeLog: - Add Item and Duty specific restrictions; - Update for 7.2 HF 1; - Add an improved Weekly loot restriction (Now it will only roll on items that doesn't have the weekly loot flag!)
